be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers

Class CollaboratorManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers.CollaboratorManagementController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddCollaboratorController.Listener, CollaboratorManagementViewController.ViewListener

    public class CollaboratorManagementController
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollaboratorManagementViewController.ViewListener, AddCollaboratorController.Listener
    Handle the logic of the management of a collaborator. This class will manage information about collaborators and is the listener of the CollaboratorManagementViewController.ViewListener.
    This will manage the interaction on the CollaboratorManagement.fxml view.
